explanation: [0-0] On a stainless steel countertop in a commercial kitchen, metal trays filled with potato and beef dishes are steaming. Spoons are hanging on a rack beside the trays. Behind the trays, there are multiple large pots and basins. On the back wall, there's a red "Polesan" logo and a black "Catering" logo.

[0-2] The scene switches to a man in a white uniform, wearing a mask and black gloves. He is standing next to a large metal container filled with ground pink minced meat. A meat grinder is placed behind the container. As the camera zooms in, two pairs of black-gloved hands put un-ground meat into the grinder.

[0-2] The scene switches to a man in a white uniform, wearing a mask and black gloves. He is standing next to a large metal container filled with ground pink minced meat. A meat grinder is placed behind the container. As the camera zooms in, two pairs of black-gloved hands put un-ground meat into the grinder.

[2-8] The scene changes again. A man in a white uniform is putting the ground meat into a huge metal container in front of him and stirring the minced meat in the container. The camera then cuts to a black-gloved hand sprinkling yellow spices onto the minced meat in the metal container, followed by circling and sprinkling a handful of red and white seasonings onto the meat. Afterward, the camera zooms out to show the man in the white uniform bending over, mixing the seasoned minced meat in the metal container with both hands.
